dcterms:description: The Berkeley Aging Cohort Study (BACS) consists of 111 controls and 29 cases, with each subject having a PIB measure (corresponding to amyloid-beta deposition), age, and gender. The dataset is used to analyze brain functional connectivity and identify regions of interest for Alzheimerâ€™s disease.
